title: Display Property 'none' Not Taking Effect in New PDF Emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not having the expected effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The issue is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none', it doesn't have the intended effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden or not displayed in the generated PDF document.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a new PDF document using the emitter.
